title: TECHNOCRUISE
text:
Technocruise is the pre-festival zonal round of Techkriti which aims to instil technical fervour and provide exceptional science and technology exposure to college students across India through a series of preliminary rounds of major technical competitions, workshops, events and talks by prominent technical leaders. 
 With a participation of over 8000 students from 250 colleges in 25 major cities spread all over the country, it continues to nurture and escalate scientific and technical talent throughout the country.
